mapper.sql: jd_sku_id, inner_product_id, inner_sku_id, inner_su_id, inner_product_unit_id, inner_pu_id, inner_picture_id, inner_att_value_id
mapper.select: SELECT jp.profit FROM jd_product_inner_id jpii LEFT JOIN jd_product jp ON jpii.jd_sku_id=jp.id WHERE jpii.inner_su_id = #{suId}
SELECT inner_pu_id FROM jd_product_inner_id where inner_sku_id = #{skuId}
